text: Terrible place! They need to shut this place down. I should have read the reviews before ordering here, but, it being Pizza Hut, I never thought it could be so bad here.  I placed an online pre-order at 1020, with an estimated delivery time …More

text: I called to place an order and the guy working put me on " hold" ( put the phone down on counter ) and asked his co workers if they wanted to take a delivery order over the phone and they said no.. The guy got back on the phone and told me …More

text: Well the woman who was working the phone hung up on me as soon as she answered. I figured that it was an accident and called back. No answer.call back no answer. Call again and she answers then immediately hangs up again? Like maybe she …More

text: I'm done, I've given this store three...three chances to get it right. They are always late and tonight I had to call the call center and was told the manager stated "it should be there soon", no apologies, no attempt to make it right, over …More

text: Rude in person, waited 30 minutes to order, delivered 40 min from order time. Pizza outer crust too hard to bite, olives shriveled, cheese cold... experience so bad, I will not use them again.

text: Ordered a primo pizza from the the 2205 E Tudor Pizza Hut. Was called and told that there wasn't any salami for the order I placed. Okay, no big deal. I told them to just add some other meat instead, but I was told that it was already …More
